jobDescription: Job DescriptionJob Title: Data AnalystWhy work here as a Data Analyst?This company provides marketing and analytics solutions in support of the entertainment industry.This is an excellent opportunity to build key data and technology-based relationships within a fast-paced startup environment.Competitive salary and benefits, with fun perks!As a Data Analyst, you will:Take full ownership of crucial projects and derive data-driven insights that will influence key decision-makingWork with continuous deployment and rapid product iteration within high-demand environmentInterface with clients to understand product needs and translate these needs into solutionsKeep up to date with modern, innovated data applications and how they influence entertainment, media, and marketingWork within a startup in its early stagesWhat Gets You the Job?Sound understanding of data science practices and principlesInfrastructure background with data pipelining experienceKnowledge in Hadoop, Kafka, No-SQL, AWSFoundation of Ruby on Rails is a plusAbility to quickly build efficient productsExcellent communication skills and interpersonal ability, both with teams and clientsAbility and willingness to learn about the business and respective clients’ issuesDrive and self-motivationCompensation: $125,000/Year◄
